Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28531 affecting package openssh for versions less than 8.9p1-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-28531 affecting package openssh for versions less than 8.9p1-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssh is earlier than 8.9p1-5, affected by CVE-2023-28531
